name: Undertale DDD 1.5 ~ Gaster vs. Eanaro
description:
Controls
Arrow Keys - Movement
Z - Confirm/ Shoot
X - Skip/ Spell
C - Mode Change
Left Shift (Hold) - Focus
------------------------------
//Changelog
[7/08/2021]

* Fixed an issue where - upon losing, the player is softlocked in the fade out screen.

* A brief window now occurs that prevents the player from using a spell right after losing a life. (To prevent wasting a bomb when failing to deathbomb)

------------------------------
So, Undertale DDD is a game now :D (Sort of)
This was a test to implement some schmup features into Undertale DDD, that I shall be incorporating in some areas of Undertale DDD Season 2. So, look out for those in the far future!

But for now, hope you enjoy this relatively short Danmakufu script regarding a sparring match of sorts between Gaster and Eanaro, that takes place somewhere in Season 2.
